overview: The girls of Klit House are really in trouble. Round after round of love making between the shapely group of beauties has left little time for studies. Dean Primmly has informed the sex crazed lovelies that they are about to be expelled. The girls decide to indoctrinate the Dean into their lesbian form of higher education and proceed into a group orgy sure to get everyone passing grades.
title: The Girls of K.L.I.T. House
